message.content:
Certainly! Here's a healthy meal plan for you that excludes the ingredients you mentioned:

Day 1:

* Breakfast: Overnight oats with chia seeds, coconut flakes, and fresh berries
* Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (carrots, zucchini, bell peppers) and a citrus vinaigrette dressing
* Dinner: Baked salmon with sweet potato and green beans

Day 2:

* Breakfast: Avocado toast with scrambled eggs and cherry tomatoes
* Lunch: Chickpea and spinach curry with brown rice
* Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted asparagus and a side of quinoa

Day 3:

* Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with frozen berries, banana, spinach, and almond milk topped with sliced fruit and nuts
* Lunch: Hummus and vegetable wrap with cucumber, tomato, and sprouts
* Dinner: Grilled tofu with roasted Brussels sprouts and a side of brown rice

Day 4:

* Breakfast: Coconut milk smoothie with mango, spinach, and chia seeds
* Lunch: Chicken and vegetable stir-fry with brown rice
* Dinner: Baked cod with roasted broccoli and a side of quinoa

Day 5:

* Breakfast: Oatmeal with sliced banana, almond butter, and hemp seeds
* Lunch: Chickpea salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and a lemon vinaigrette dressing
* Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted carrots and a side of quinoa

Day 6:

* Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach, mushrooms, and whole wheat toast
* Lunch: Tuna salad sandwich with mixed greens and cucumber on whole wheat bread
* Dinner: Baked chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans

Day 7:

* Breakfast: Chia seed pudding with sliced mango, coconut flakes, and a drizzle of honey
* Lunch: Veggie and hummus wrap with cucumber, tomato, and sprouts
* Dinner: Grilled tofu with roasted Brussels sprouts and a side of quinoa

This meal plan includes a variety of healthy and delicious options that are free from the ingredients you mentioned. All of the meals are balanced and provide a good mix of protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates to keep you energized and satisfied throughout the day. Enjoy!
